io.robusta.rra.utils

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.robusta.rra.utils.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    FileUtilities brings frequently used funcions, to be used in a standard Windows/unix/Android environements

    in a Linux, Windows & AppEngine environment

    Created by Nicolas Zozol for Robusta Code
    Author:
    Nicolas Zozol

      • createDirectory

                   java.lang.String directoryName)
                            throws FileException
        Create a directory
        Parameters:
        rootPath - directory or mount point containing your future directory
        directoryName - name of the future directory
        Throws:
        FileException

      • deleteDirectory

        public static void deleteDirectory(java.io.File path)
                            throws FileException

        Delete a directory. It first delete recursively all subdirectories, then all files of this directory, then the directory.

        The code was partially found in the net - it's very likely to be public domain.

        Parameters:
        path - java.io.File representation of the directory
        Throws:
        FileException - if the path does not exist or if the directory can't be deleted for any unknown reason.

        Parameters:
